column2: ENGLISH
The peasant army ravaging the county of [Root.GetName] is burning down buildings!
The peasant army ravaging the county of [From.GetName] is burning down my buildings!
I have been attacked by the peasants rebels in [Root.Location.GetName]!
[From.GetTitledName] has been captured and killed by peasant rebels!

My liege,
I was ambushed by a mob of peasant rebels and barely got away with my life. The attack has left me maimed and I fear for the life of me and those around me in [From.Location.GetName]. These rebels must be stopped.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]

My liege,
Although I escaped with my life, the mob of peasant rebels that attacked me managed to wound me. I fear these attacks will only increase until the revolt in [From.Location.GetName] is put down.
Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Tired of their old ruler [From.GetTitledName], the peasant rebels of [Root.GetName] have defected and sworn allegiance to me!
The peasant rebels of [From.GetName] have defected and sworn allegiance to [From.County.Holder.GetTitledName]!

The people in [From.GetName] will no longer let themselves be ruled by someone of another religion! The peasant rebels controlling the county have defected and sworn allegiance to [From.County.Holder.GetTitledName]!

Feeling estranged due to cultural differences in [FromFrom.Holder.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName], the peasant rebels of [FromFrom.GetName] have defected and sworn allegiance to [From.County.Holder.GetTitledName]!
Feeling little loyalty to their previous far off ruler, the peasant rebels of [FromFrom.GetName] have defected and sworn allegiance to [From.County.Holder.GetTitledName]!
Tired of their old ruler, the peasant rebels of [Root.GetName] have defected and sworn allegiance to me!
The people in [Root.GetName] will no longer let themselves be ruled by someone of another religion! The peasant rebels controlling the county have defected and sworn allegiance to another ruler!
Feeling estranged due to cultural differences in [Root.Holder.Liege.PrimaryTitle.GetName], the peasant rebels of [Root.GetName] have defected and sworn allegiance to another ruler!
Feeling little loyalty to their previous far off ruler, the peasant rebels of [Root.GetName] have defected and sworn allegiance to another ruler!
Is there anything they won't destroy?
They killed me?!
How dare they execute a subject of mine!
They sure do...
This peasant rabble must be stopped!
Excellent! Or is it...?
Damn these peasants!
Excellent! Or is it...?
Bad news, but I am glad it didn't happen to my holdings...
Damn these rebels!
I am lucky to be alive...
